dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4853 IH: Commonsense Flood Prevention Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Babin (for himself, Mr. Weber of Texas, and Mr. Higgins of Louisiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To require FERC to examine certain hydropower licences.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Commonsense Flood Prevention Act.

section.header: Examination of licenses for certain projects located in disaster areas
section.text: Not later than one year after the date of enactment of this Act, the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission shall examine each license issued by the Commission under part I of the Federal Power Act for the following projects:

paragraph.text: Federal Energy Regulatory Commission project numbered 2305.
Federal Energy Regulatory Commission project numbered 12362.
